Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could greatly enhance your daily routine or professional tasks. Given its high-quality features and benefits, I estimate its value to be significantly more than $120. Considering the exceptional value it provides, I am offering it to you for $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the time and effort put into ensuring its quality and functionality. I trust that you will find this investment worthwhile. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. Looking forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
